hero.title: Support, motivation, and real care — in one place
hero.subtitle: Mindra is your supportive AI companion. Talk when you feel overwhelmed, burned out, lonely, or stuck. Build habits, set goals, use premium voice or face-to-face calls — all in one space.
hero.note: Not a medical or crisis service. Always here to listen.

what.title: What is Mindra?
what.text: Mindra is a supportive AI project designed to help you feel heard, grounded, and motivated. It’s not about pressure or productivity — it’s about care, presence, and steady progress.

1.title: Talk freely
1.text: Share what’s on your mind — stress, doubts, burnout, or everyday thoughts.

2.title: Get support
2.text: Receive calm, empathetic responses, guidance, and emotional support.

3.title: Move forward
3.text: Set goals, build habits, track progress, and grow at your own pace.

features.title: Everything Mindra offers
features.subtitle: All features work together — no fragments, no pressure.

chat.title: Supportive chat
chat.text: Warm, judgment-free conversations when you feel overwhelmed, tired, or alone.

voice.title: Premium voice
voice.text: Natural, calming voice responses for deeper emotional presence.

face.title: Face-to-face calls
face.text: Talk to Mindra in real-time with visual presence and voice.

goals.title: Goals & habits
goals.text: Set goals, build habits, and track progress without pressure.

habits.title: Daily habits
habits.text: Gentle habit tracking designed to support consistency, not guilt.

reminders.title: Reminders & check-ins
reminders.text: Smart reminders and daily check-ins to keep you connected with yourself.

final.title: You don’t have to go through it alone
final.subtitle: Mindra is here when you need support, clarity, or simply someone who listens.
final.note: Supportive AI companion. Not therapy or medical care.

refunds.title: Política de Reembolsos
refunds.contact: Para solicitudes de reembolso, contacta a:

sections.p: Todas las compras de suscripciones y funciones digitales de Mindra son finales y no reembolsables.

Si utilizas cualquier parte del servicio después de la compra — incluyendo mensajes de chat, voz premium, llamadas cara a cara, metas, hábitos o recordatorios — renuncias a cualquier derecho de reembolso. Esto incluye el uso de incluso un solo mensaje, segundo o minuto.
Debido al consumo inmediato de recursos, cualquier uso de funciones de voz premium o llamadas cara a cara hace que la compra sea estrictamente no reembolsable.

Un reembolso solo podrá considerarse si una suscripción se renovó automáticamente, el servicio no fue utilizado después de la renovación y la suscripción fue cancelada de inmediato. Cualquier reembolso se concede únicamente a discreción de Mindra Group LLC.
Mindra Group LLC no tiene obligación de emitir reembolsos y puede rechazar cualquier solicitud permitida por la ley.
